Elkardiya:
At the lowest, level 3 dungeon guarded by twin sisters Altar of Shilen. They are called the High Priestess of Blood and Melissa Great Enchantress Isadora. They are among the Embryo heads, and has already absorbed the force of the seven seals, so that their strength increased manifold.
You must destroy them in order to destroy the Altar of Shilen. I can open the door to the 1st and 2nd dungeon levels, but to open the doors to the third level, you will need help My friend Farikiosa that awaits you. Ask him for help.
